}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1088 QDS-BRCM1088] {{â€¢}} [https://industrycanada.co/business.php?id=4324A IC Doc]
*'''Dell Wireless 1830 (DW1830)''' - [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 :BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM20703A1 (DW1830 Bluetooth 4.1 LE) :[[Foxconn U40H039.00]] OUI:60:6D:C7 ([http://www.3dnews.ru/assets/external/illustrations/2016/02/08/928051/photo_46.jpg image]) ([https://www.snbforums.com/attachments/dw1830-intel-7260-png.5427/ vs])
===Specifications=== [[Broadcom BCM943602BAED]] 802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT 4.1, 3x3, 2.4/5 GHz (key A+E)
Based on ''Broadcom'''s naming scheme, this device is assumed to be using BCM43602. :[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom'' News Release for BCM43602] [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 Vendor ID: 0x14e4, DeviceID: 0x43ba *BCM43602 14e4:43ba supported in 3.17+ ([http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcmfmac]) *BCM43602 14e4:43bb 2.4 GHz device, supported in 3.19+ *BCM43602 14e4:43bc 5 GHz device, supported in 3.19+ :Broadcom BCM20703 (chipset support BT 4.1 LE)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.tonymacx86.com/threads/guide-airport-pcie-half-mini-v2.104850/page-170 ''Broadcom BCM943602BAED'' on '''tonymacx86''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1665-dell-dw1830-bcm943602baed-1300mbps/ ''DELL DW1830 BCM943602BAED 1300Mbps'' on '''Openitforum.pl'''] :[[Broadcom BCM943602BAED]] ('''Dell DW1830''') :NGFF M.2 Key A+E, 14e4:43ba, 3x3:3 MIMO :Bluetooth: BCM20703A1 (BCM2045A0), 0a5c:6410 ::<small>Wifi works natively, without dsdt mods etc... ::Bluetooth works with BrcmPatchRAM ::Maybe it can work native, if we can change dev:ven id to 05ac:8290</small> *[https://www.tonymacx86.com/threads/bcm943602baed-with-vendorid-deviceid-14e4-aa52.196707/ ''BCM943602BAED'' on '''tonymacx86''' forums] :[[Broadcom BCM943602BAED]] (14e4:43ba, 14e4:aa52) :DW1830 3x3 802.11ac 2.4/5GHz + Bluetooth 4.1 *[[User:Skvo|''Skvo'']] [http://www.tonymacx86.com/general-hardware-discussion/99327-could-next-wlan-bluetooth-combo-card-2013-macbooks.html notes the pinout of the proprietary connector used on '''tonymacx86''' forums] *[https://applelife.ru/threads/wi-fi-bluetooth-airdrop-handoff-i-instant-hotspot-v-os-x-10-10.42443/page-12#post-493447 On '''AppleLife''' forums] *[http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/user/332888-skvo/ On '''InsanelyMac''' forums]
